News.SubTitle: Initial Release!
News.Title: TOR-W: Launchpad v1.0.0
Text: ♦♦ Thank you for downloading and playing TOR-W: L! ♦♦

News.SubTitle: Bug fixes and more..
News.Title: TOR-W: Launchpad v1.0.1
Text: ★ Updated the cosmetics for the V.I.P modifier.
★ Hacker role not letting players un-hack nodes.
★ Giant modifier making player go out of boundaries when climbing up ladders.
♦♦ Thank you for downloading and playing TOR-W: L! ♦♦

News.SubTitle: New Release!
News.Title: TOR-W: Launchpad v1.1.0
Text: ★ Updated the cosmetics for the V.I.P modifier.
★ Added Neutral Killer role as a template role.
★ Updated "Crewmate Roles" to "♦ Crewmate Roles ♦" and so on for the others.
★ Hacker role not letting players un-hack nodes.
★ Giant modifier making player go out of boundaries when climbing up ladders.
♦♦ Thank you for downloading and playing TOR-W: L! ♦♦

News.SubTitle: Bug fixes and more..
News.Title: TOR-W: Launchpad v1.1.1
Text: ★ Bait Modifier (@WanderingPix) - Your killer self reports when you are killed.
★ Torch Modifier (LPR Modifier) - You can see when lights are down.
★ Neutral Killer - Kill everyone. Seems simple?.
★ Menu Changes -Added some colors for the menus in settings.
★ Hacker role not letting players un-hack nodes (almost fixed).
★ Giant modifier making player go out of boundaries when climbing up ladders.
♦♦ Thank you for downloading and playing TOR-W: L! ♦♦

News.SubTitle: Feature Updates
News.Title: TOR-W: Launchpad v1.1.2
Text: This update adds some menu changes, and some role selecting features. Such as selecting the amount of the actual modifier can spawn per game, and more!
★ In-Game Wiki (Idea from Town Of Us: Mira).
★ TOR-W: L Launcher (Idea from All Of Us server).
★ Auto-Posting Codes (Idea from EHR [Host Only mod]).
★ Menu Changes - Added some colors for the menus in settings.
★ Hacker role not letting players un-hack nodes (almost fixed).
★ Giant modifier making player go out of boundaries when climbing up ladders.
♦♦ Thank you for downloading and playing TOR-W: L! ♦♦

News.SubTitle: Future Updates
News.Title: TOR-W: Launchpad v1.2.0 Dev-1 & Dev-2
Text: This is NOT the final changelogs for v1.2.0!!! Just some stuff I added in Dev-1 & Dev-2.
★ Added Tavern Keeper (aka Witch Doctor renamed).
★ In-Game Wiki (Idea from Town Of Us: Mira).
★ TOR-W: L Launcher (Idea from All Of Us server).
★ Auto-Posting Codes (Idea from EHR [Host Only mod]).
★ Hacker role not letting players un-hack nodes (almost fixed).
★ Giant modifier making player go out of boundaries when climbing up ladders.
♦♦ Thank you for downloading and playing TOR-W: L! ♦♦
